      <h1>Visit Afghanistan</h1>
      <p>
        Afghanistan is a landlocked country located at the crossroad of Central Asia and South Asia
        Referred to the heart of Asia, it is the bordered by Pakistan to the east and south, Iran to the west, 
        Turkmenistan to the northest, and China to the northeast and east. The capital is Kabul and it's a nice city with different nations.
      </p>
